description: Fan-favorite gay porn star Sergeant Miles wanted to get a taste of Alexander Volkov as quickly as possible. And when the Lucas Entertainment production team showed Volkov who his on-set secret admirer was, he wasn’t going to say no to Sergeant’s request. But the look of Sergeant sparked in Volkov the desire to top, and Sergeant wasn’t about to deny him his request, either.
title: Alexander Volkov Tops Sergeant Miles
